verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְאָ֫סָ֥ף <WH623> of Asaph אַ֤ךְ <WH389> Surely ט֭וֹב <WH2896> [is] good לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <WH3478> to Israel אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> Truly God לְבָרֵ֥י <WH1249> [even] to such as are of a clean לֵבָֽב׃ <WH3824> heart

וַאֲנִ֗י <WH589> I כִּ֭מְעַט <WH4592> were almost [נָטוּי כ] (נָטָ֣יוּ <WH5186> afternoon ק) רַגְלָ֑י <WH7272> But as for me my feet כְּ֝אַ֗יִן <WH369> had well nigh [שֻׁפְּכָה כ] (שֻׁפְּכ֥וּ <WH8210> cast ק) אֲשֻׁרָֽי׃ <WH838> my steps
כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for קִ֭נֵּאתִי <WH7065> For I was envious בַּֽהוֹלְלִ֑ים <WH1984> at the foolish שְׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> the prosperity רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> of the wicked אֶרְאֶֽה׃ <WH7200> [when] I saw
כִּ֤י <WH3588> For אֵ֖ין <WH369> there חַרְצֻבּ֥וֹת <WH2784> For [there are] no bands לְמוֹתָ֗ם <WH4194> in their death וּבָרִ֥יא <WH1277> [is] firm אוּלָֽם׃ <WH193> but their strength

בַּעֲמַ֣ל <WH5999> They [are] not in trouble אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <WH582> [as other] men אֵינֵ֑מוֹ <WH369> else וְעִם־ <WH5973> like אָ֝דָ֗ם <WH120> [other] men לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יְנֻגָּֽעוּ׃ <WH5060> neither are they plagued

לָ֭כֵן <WH3651> Therefore עֲנָקַ֣תְמוֹ <WH6059> compasseth them about as a chain גַאֲוָ֑ה <WH1346> Therefore pride יַעֲטָף־ <WH5848> covereth שִׁ֝֗ית <WH7897> them [as] a garment חָמָ֥ס <WH2555> violence לָֽמוֹ׃
יָ֭צָא <WH3318> stand out מֵחֵ֣לֶב <WH2459> with fatness עֵינֵ֑מוֹ <WH5869> Their eyes עָ֝בְר֗וּ <WH5674> they have more מַשְׂכִּיּ֥וֹת <WH4906> could wish לֵבָֽב׃ <WH3824> than heart
יָמִ֤יקוּ ׀ <WH4167> They are corrupt וִידַבְּר֣וּ <WH1696> and speak בְרָ֣ע <WH7451> wickedly עֹ֑שֶׁק <WH6233> [concerning] oppression מִמָּר֥וֹם <WH4791> loftily יְדַבֵּֽרוּ׃ <WH1696> they speak

שַׁתּ֣וּ <WH8371> They set בַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> against the heavens פִּיהֶ֑ם <WH6310> their mouth וּ֝לְשׁוֹנָ֗ם <WH3956> and their tongue תִּֽהֲלַ֥ךְ <WH1980> walketh בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> through the earth

לָכֵ֤ן ׀ <WH3651> Therefore [יָשִׁיב כ] (יָשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> break ק) עַמּ֣וֹ <WH5971> Therefore his people הֲלֹ֑ם <WH1988> hither וּמֵ֥י <WH4325> and waters מָ֝לֵ֗א <WH4392> of a full יִמָּ֥צוּ <WH4680> [cup] are wrung out לָֽמוֹ׃
וְֽאָמְר֗וּ <WH559> And they say אֵיכָ֥ה <WH349> how יָדַֽע־ <WH3045> know אֵ֑ל <WH410> How doth God וְיֵ֖שׁ <WH3426> ? and is there דֵּעָ֣ה <WH1844> knowledge בְעֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <WH5945> the Most

הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> these רְשָׁעִ֑ים <WH7563> Behold these [are] the ungodly וְשַׁלְוֵ֥י <WH7961> who prosper ע֝וֹלָ֗ם <WH5769> in the world הִשְׂגּוּ־ <WH7685> they increase חָֽיִל׃ <WH2428> [in] riches

אַךְ־ <WH389> Surely רִ֭יק <WH7385> [in] vain זִכִּ֣יתִי <WH2135> Verily I have cleansed לְבָבִ֑י <WH3824> my heart וָאֶרְחַ֖ץ <WH7364> and washed בְּנִקָּי֣וֹן <WH5356> in innocency כַּפָּֽי׃ <WH3709> my hands
וָאֱהִ֣י <WH1961> become נָ֭גוּעַ <WH5060> long have I been plagued כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> For all the day וְ֝תוֹכַחְתִּ֗י <WH8433> and chastened לַבְּקָרִֽים׃ <WH1242> every morning

אִם־ <WH518> If אָ֭מַרְתִּי <WH559> If I say אֲסַפְּרָ֥ה <WH5608> I will speak כְמ֑וֹ <WH3644> thus הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold ד֭וֹר <WH1755> [against] the generation בָּנֶ֣יךָ <WH1121> of thy children בָגָֽדְתִּי׃ <WH898> behold I should offend
וָֽ֭אֲחַשְּׁבָה <WH2803> When I thought לָדַ֣עַת <WH3045> to know זֹ֑את <WH2063> it was עָמָ֖ל <WH5999> this it [was] too painful [הִיא כ] (ה֣וּא <WH1931> he ק) בְעֵינָֽי׃ <WH5869> for me
עַד־ <WH5704> Until אָ֭בוֹא <WH935> Until I went אֶל־ <WH413> into מִקְדְּשֵׁי־ <WH4720> into the sanctuary אֵ֑ל <WH410> of God אָ֝בִ֗ינָה <WH995> [then] understood לְאַחֲרִיתָֽם׃ <WH319> I their end

אַ֣ךְ <WH389> Surely בַּ֭חֲלָקוֹת <WH2513> them in slippery places תָּשִׁ֣ית <WH7896> Surely thou didst set לָ֑מוֹ הִ֝פַּלְתָּ֗ם <WH5307> thou castedst them down לְמַשּׁוּאֽוֹת׃ <WH4876> into destruction

אֵ֤יךְ <WH349> How הָי֣וּ <WH1961> become לְשַׁמָּ֣ה <WH8047> How are they [brought] into desolation כְרָ֑גַע <WH7281> as in a moment סָ֥פוּ <WH5486> they are utterly תַ֝֗מּוּ <WH8552> consumed מִן־ <WH4480> by בַּלָּהֽוֹת׃ <WH1091> with terrors

כַּחֲל֥וֹם <WH2472> As a dream מֵהָקִ֑יץ <WH6974> when [one] awaketh אֲ֝דֹנָי <WH136> [so] O Lord בָּעִ֤יר ׀ <WH5782> when thou awakest צַלְמָ֬ם <WH6754> their image תִּבְזֶֽה׃ <WH959> thou shalt despise
כִּ֭י <WH3588> When יִתְחַמֵּ֣ץ <WH2556> was grieved לְבָבִ֑י <WH3824> Thus my heart וְ֝כִלְיוֹתַ֗י <WH3629> in my reins אֶשְׁתּוֹנָֽן׃ <WH8150> and I was pricked
וַאֲנִי־ <WH589> I בַ֭עַר <WH1198> So foolish וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> I אֵדָ֑ע <WH3045> [was] I and ignorant בְּ֝הֵמ֗וֹת <WH929> I was [as] a beast הָיִ֥יתִי <WH1961> become עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> before
וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am תָמִ֣יד <WH8548> Nevertheless I [am] continually עִמָּ֑ךְ <WH5973> You אָ֝חַ֗זְתָּ <WH270> with thee thou hast holden בְּיַד־ <WH3027> hand יְמִינִֽי׃ <WH3225> [me] by my right
בַּעֲצָתְךָ֥ <WH6098> me with thy counsel תַנְחֵ֑נִי <WH5148> Thou shalt guide וְ֝אַחַ֗ר <WH310> and afterward כָּב֥וֹד <WH3519> me [to] glory תִּקָּחֵֽנִי׃ <WH3947> receive

מִי־ <WH4310> Whom לִ֥י בַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> Whom have I in heaven וְ֝עִמְּךָ֗ <WH5973> and besides לֹא־ <WH3808> nothing חָפַ֥צְתִּי <WH2654> [that] I desire בָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> [but thee]? and [there is] none upon earth

כָּלָ֥ה <WH3615> faileth שְׁאֵרִ֗י <WH7607> My flesh וּלְבָ֫בִ֥י <WH3824> and my heart צוּר־ <WH6697> [is] the strength לְבָבִ֥י <WH3824> of my heart וְחֶלְקִ֗י <WH2506> and my portion אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> [but] God לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> for ever

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold רְחֵקֶ֣יךָ <WH7369> For lo they that are far יֹאבֵ֑דוּ <WH6> from thee shall perish הִ֝צְמַ֗תָּה <WH6789> thou hast destroyed כָּל־ <WH3605> all זוֹנֶ֥ה <WH2181> all them that go a whoring מִמֶּֽךָּ׃ <WH4480> at

וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ <WH589> But קִֽרֲבַ֥ת <WH7132> for me to draw near אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> to God לִ֫י־ ט֥וֹב <WH2896> [it is] good שַׁתִּ֤י ׀ <WH7896> I have put בַּאדֹנָ֣י <WH136> in the Lord יְהֹוִ֣ה <WH3069> GOD מַחְסִ֑י <WH4268> my trust לְ֝סַפֵּ֗ר <WH5608> that I may declare כָּל־ <WH3605> of all מַלְאֲכוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH4399> all thy works
